comments.en: Four separately changable cartridges for black and the colours

Sophisticated, but not too expensive 4-ink small-office printer. With 20ppm for black text (economy mode) it is very fast for an inkjet, faster than many older desktop lasers. Very durable water- and light proof printouts and high printing quality on normal paper due to pigment inks.

180 nozzles black, 3x60 nozzles for the colours, 3 pl droplets, variable drop size.

Parallel and USB ports.

Full support in GIMP-Print 4.2.2 or newer (for older versions choose the C80 as your printer model).

On the USB this printer needs to be activated with a special control sequence, simply sending plain text to it does not make it printing. You can send this control sequence by checking the ink levels or cleaning the nozzles with "escputil", the printer maintenance utility which comes with GIMP-Print.
